parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Actual body.

operations.notes:
Manage your data records

Write a new data record. Payload should be in the semantics as specified in the sensor configuration.

responseMessages.message: Success. New record has been written into the database.

If any of the essential parameters are missing (BAD_REQUEST ) or If the data provided in the request body is not proper as per the data units of streams (INVALID_DATA) or If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If the source is inactive (SOURCE_INACTIVE) or If there is an error retrieving the payload (ERROR_RETRIEVING_PAYLOAD) or If there is an error splitting multiple records (ERROR_SPLITTING_RECORDS) or If there is an error in parsing multiple streams (ERROR_SPLITTING_STREAMS).

operations.summary: Write a new data record

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format. If there's no timezone mentioned, the default timezone will be of the source.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format. If there's no timezone mentioned, the default timezone will be of the source.

parameters.name: streamNames
parameters.description: A comma separated list of stream names that should be included in the data. If this parameter is not specified, all streams will be included.

operations.notes:
Manage your data records

Get a list of data records for a source and a set of streams. In a single call, 1000 latest records will be sent.

responseMessages.message: If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST) or If the source key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_SOURCE_KEY) or If there is an invalid stream present in streamsNames (INVALID_DATA_STREAM)

operations.summary: Get a list of data records for a source and a set of streams

parameters.name: body

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

operations.notes: Get energy generated by the specified plant.

responseMessages.message: If the plant slug mentioned is invalid (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: streamNames
parameters.description: A comma separated list of stream names that should be included in the data. There has to be at least one stream mentioned.

operations.notes: Get inverter data for a plant slug and inverter key.

responseMessages.message: If the plant slug mentioned is invalid (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If the inverter key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_INVERTER_KEY) or If there is an invalid stream present in streamsNames (INVALID_DATA_STREAM) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

operations.summary: Get inverter data for a plant slug and inverter key

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Start time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time of data lookup. It should be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: aggregator
parameters.description: It should be HOUR/DAY/FIVE_MINUTES

operations.notes: Get energy generated by the specified inverter aggregated over a time period.

responseMessages.message: If the plant slug mentioned is invalid (INVALID_PLANT_SLUG) or If the inverter key mentioned is invalid (INVALID_INVERTER_KEY) or If essential parameters are not specified in the request or dates are not mentioned in the correct format (BAD_REQUEST).

operations.summary: Get energy generated by the specified inverter aggregated over a time period

name.description: Stream name

values.description: Stream values at the given timestamps

name.description: Stream name

startTime.description: The first timestamp of the returned data

timestamps.description: The timestamps at which data was reported

name.description: Name of the data stream, should be unique for this source

source.description: Key of the source this ConfigField belongs to

streamDataType.description: Type of the data this stream reports

streamDateTimeFormat.description: DateTime field values should be reported in ISO 8601 formats. You can specify custom formats here.

streamPositionInCSV.description: Applicable only if source dataFormat is CSV, should be unique

name.description: The name of the organization

slug.description: The name in all lowercase, suitable for URL identification

capacity.description: The capacity of the solar plant in KW

location.description: The location of the plant (City, State)

latitude.description: The latitude coordinates of the plant location

longitude.description: The latitude coordinates of the plant location

insertionTime.description: The timestamps at which action was reported

name.description: Name of the source, it should be unique

UID.description: If UID is specified, it should be unique across the entire platform.

dataFormat.description: The format in which this source sends data records

textMessageWithHTTP200.description: Text message to be accompanied with HTTP 200 OK

textMessageWithError.description: Text message to be accompanied with an error

isActive.description: Data will be accepted only if this parameter is True

isMonitored.description: This source will be monitored only if this parameter is True

actuationEnabled.description: If this source has actuation features enabled. Keep it unchecked if unsure.

csvDataKeyName.description: Key name that holds comma separated data (applicable only if source dataFormat is CSV)

timeoutInterval.description: If there is no data for these many seconds, a notification will be raised
